# R Shiny Dashboard Projects
> These dashboards were developed for the Talent Incubator Program -  Global Supply Chain Laboratory at Texas A&M University.
  It was used to monitor the progress of various business development projects done by the undergrad students.
  
  Dummy data is currently used in the dashboard as these were industry funded projects.

### Survey Performance and Survey Results Dashboard
https://adithyaajith.shinyapps.io/survey_performance/

- Survey over telephone was done to capture the customer experince and capture the VOC.

### Sales Lead Generation Project Dashboard
https://adithyaajith.shinyapps.io/lead_generation_dashboard/

- Cold calling campaign to generate potential bussiness leads.
